API Reference¶

This page gives an overview of all public tdmtpy objects, methods and functions.

Core Modules¶

tdmtpy.configure

Set global tdmtpy configuration

tdmtpy.inversion

Time domain moment tensor inverse routines

tdmtpy.tensor

Routines for handling inversion results

tdmtpy.image

Plotting routines for tdmtpy

tdmtpy.utils

Utility functionality for tdmtpy

Scripts¶

tdmtpy.scripts.run

tdmtpy command line utility
